class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration
class.query: select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.title = :title and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.shortTitle = :shortTitle and cpr.ppid = :ppid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.participant p where cpr.collectionProtocol.shortTitle = :shortTitle and p.empi = :empi
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.participant p where cpr.collectionProtocol.shortTitle = :shortTitle and p.uid = :uid
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId and cpr.participant.id = :participantId
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr where cpr.collectionProtocol.id = :cpId order by cpr.id

select site.name, count(*) from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.site site join cpr.collectionProtocol cp where cp.id = :cpId and site.id in (:siteIds) group by site.name
select cpr from com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.CollectionProtocolRegistration cpr join cpr.collectionProtocol cp where cp.shortTitle = :cpShortTitle and cpr.ppid in (:ppids)
class.sql-query: select record_id as recordId from os_cpr_cust_fields where cpr_id = :cprId and form_id = :formId and form_ctxt_id = :formCtxtId
select cpr_id as cprId, record_id as recordId from os_cpr_cust_fields where cpr_id in (:cprIds) and form_id = :formId and form_ctxt_id = :formCtxtId
insert into os_cpr_cust_fields(cpr_id, form_id, form_ctxt_id, record_id) values (:cprId, :formId, :formCtxtId, :recordId)
insert into os_form_record_statuses (identifier, form_id, record_id, form_status) values (:cprId, :formId, :recordId, :formStatus)
update os_form_record_statuses set form_status = :formStatus where identifier = :cprId and form_id = :formId and record_id = :recordId
